statements: SELECT * FROM blockchain_data;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM blockchain_data WHERE block_id = 10;
SELECT transaction_id, block_id, transaction_hash FROM blockchain_data WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_data ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT block_id, count(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM blockchain_data GROUP BY block_id;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_data WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT transaction_hash, transaction_amount FROM blockchain_data WHERE block_id = 10 ORDER BY transaction_amount ASC
SELECT block_id, AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_amount FROM blockchain_data GROUP BY block_id
SELECT * FROM blockchain_data WHERE block_id IN (5, 10, 15) AND transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT block_id) AS total_blocks, MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_amount FROM blockchain_data
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE receiver_address = '0x123abc'
SELECT sender_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM blockchain_transactions
SELECT block_id, block_hash, timestamp FROM block_headers WHERE block_id = 100
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE sender_address = 'alice' OR receiver_address = 'bob' ORDER BY amount DESC, timestamp ASC
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT * FROM block_headers WHERE num_transactions > 5 ORDER BY num_transactions DESC
SELECT block_id, block_hash, timestamp FROM block_headers WHERE block_hash IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM blockchain_transactions
SELECT transaction_hash FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT block_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS num_transactions FROM blockchain_transactions GROUP BY block_id
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT transaction_id, block_id, timestamp FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE block_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT block_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM blockchain_transactions GROUP BY block_id HAVING total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_hash FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND amount < 500 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT DISTINCT block_id, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM blockchain_transactions GROUP BY block_id HAVING transaction_count > 5 ORDER BY transaction_count DESC
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address, amount, timestamp FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT verification_id, transaction_id, verified_by, verification_result, timestamp FROM transaction_verification WHERE verification_result = TRUE;
SELECT total_blocks, total_transactions FROM blockchain_metadata WHERE chain_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM block_headers ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT block_id, previous_block_id, timestamp FROM block_headers WHERE nonce < 5000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT verification_id, verified_by, verification_result FROM transaction_verification WHERE verification_result = TRUE LIMIT 5;
SELECT metadata_id, chain_id, total_blocks, total_transactions FROM blockchain_metadata ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_block LIMIT 10;
SELECT block_id, transaction_id, amount FROM transaction_block WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT block_id, transaction_id, timestamp FROM transaction_block WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT from_account, to_account, amount FROM transaction_block WHERE amount < 500 ORDER BY from_account, to_account LIMIT 5;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp FROM transaction_block WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM account WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT account_name, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM account GROUP BY account_name HAVING SUM(balance) > 5000;
SELECT block_id, transaction_id, amount, from_account, to_account, timestamp FROM transaction_block WHERE amount >= 500 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM block_chain WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY block_height ASC;
SELECT account_name, balance, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM account INNER JOIN transaction ON account.account_id = transaction.from_account GROUP BY account_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
